verses.verse: And the LORD<WH3068> spoke<WH1696> to Moses<WH4872> and to Aaron,<WH175> saying,<WH559>

Every man<WH376> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> shall pitch<WH2583> by his own standard,<WH1714> with the ensign<WH226> of their father's<WH1> house:<WH1004> far<WH5048> off about<WH5439> the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> shall they pitch.<WH2583>

And on the east<WH6924> side<WH6924> toward the rising<WH4217> of the sun shall they of the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Judah<WH3063> pitch<WH2583> throughout their armies:<WH6635> and Nahshon<WH5177> the son<WH1121> of Amminadab<WH5992> shall be captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Judah.<WH3063>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were three score<WH7657> and fourteen<WH702> <WH7657> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967>

And those that do pitch<WH2583> next to him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Issachar:<WH3485> and Nethaneel<WH5417> the son<WH1121> of Zuar<WH6686> shall be captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Issachar.<WH3485>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> thereof, were fifty<WH2572> and four<WH702> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>
Then the tribe<WH4294> of Zebulun:<WH2074> and Eliab<WH446> the son<WH1121> of Helon<WH2497> shall be captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Zebulun.<WH2074>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> thereof, were fifty<WH2572> and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

All<WH3605> that were numbered<WH6485> in the camp<WH4264> of Judah<WH3063> were an hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and fourscore<WH8084> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred,<WH3967> throughout their armies.<WH6635> These shall first<WH7223> set<WH5265> forth.<WH5265>

On the south<WH8486> side shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> according to their armies:<WH6635> and the captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Reuben<WH7205> shall be Elizur<WH468> the son<WH1121> of Shedeur.<WH7707>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> thereof, were forty<WH705> and six<WH8337> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>

And those which pitch<WH2583> by him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Simeon:<WH8095> and the captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Simeon<WH8095> shall be Shelumiel<WH8017> the son<WH1121> of Zurishaddai.<WH6701>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were fifty<WH2572> and nine<WH8672> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> hundred.<WH3967>
Then the tribe<WH4294> of Gad:<WH1410> and the captain<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Gad<WH1410> shall be Eliasaph<WH460> the son<WH1121> of Reuel.<WH7467>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were forty<WH705> and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572>

All<WH3605> that were numbered<WH6485> in the camp<WH4264> of Reuben<WH7205> were an hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and fifty<WH2572> and one<WH259> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred<WH3967> and fifty,<WH2572> throughout their armies.<WH6635> And they shall set<WH5265> forth<WH5265> in the second<WH8145> rank.

Then the tabernacle<WH168> of the congregation<WH4150> shall set<WH5265> forward<WH5265> with the camp<WH4264> of the Levites<WH3881> in the middle<WH8432> of the camp:<WH4264> as they encamp,<WH2583> so<WH3651> shall they set<WH5265> forward,<WH5265> every man<WH376> in his place<WH3027> by their standards.<WH1714>

On the west<WH3220> side shall be the standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Ephraim<WH669> according to their armies:<WH6635> and the captain<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Ephraim<WH669> shall be Elishama<WH476> the son<WH1121> of Ammihud.<WH5989>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were forty<WH705> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>
And by him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Manasseh:<WH4519> and the captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Manasseh<WH4519> shall be Gamaliel<WH1583> the son<WH1121> of Pedahzur.<WH6301>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were thirty<WH7970> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> and two hundred.<WH3967>
Then the tribe<WH4294> of Benjamin:<WH1144> and the captain<WH5387> of the sons<WH1121> of Benjamin<WH1144> shall be Abidan<WH27> the son<WH1121> of Gideoni.<WH1441>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were thirty<WH7970> and five<WH2568> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

All<WH3605> that were numbered<WH6485> of the camp<WH4264> of Ephraim<WH669> were an hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and eight<WH8083> thousand<WH505> and an hundred,<WH3967> throughout their armies.<WH6635> And they shall go<WH5265> forward<WH5265> in the third<WH7992> rank.

The standard<WH1714> of the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> shall be on the north<WH6828> side by their armies:<WH6635> and the captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Dan<WH1835> shall be Ahiezer<WH295> the son<WH1121> of Ammishaddai.<WH5993>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were three score<WH8346> and two<WH8147> thousand<WH505> and seven<WH7651> hundred.<WH3967>

And those that encamp<WH2583> by him shall be the tribe<WH4294> of Asher:<WH836> and the captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Asher<WH836> shall be Pagiel<WH6295> the son<WH1121> of Ocran.<WH5918>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were forty<WH705> and one<WH259> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred.<WH3967>
Then the tribe<WH4294> of Naphtali:<WH5321> and the captain<WH5387> of the children<WH1121> of Naphtali<WH5321> shall be Ahira<WH299> the son<WH1121> of Enan.<WH5881>
And his host,<WH6635> and those that were numbered<WH6485> of them, were fifty<WH2572> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and four<WH702> hundred.<WH3967>

All<WH3605> they that were numbered<WH6485> in the camp<WH4264> of Dan<WH1835> were an hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and fifty<WH2572> and seven<WH7651> thousand<WH505> and six<WH8337> hundred.<WH3967> They shall go<WH5265> hindmost<WH314> with their standards.<WH1714>

These<WH428> are those which were numbered<WH6485> of the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> by the house<WH1004> of their fathers:<WH1> all<WH3605> those that were numbered<WH6485> of the camps<WH4264> throughout their hosts<WH6635> were six<WH8337> hundred<WH3967> thousand<WH505> and three<WH7969> thousand<WH505> and five<WH2568> hundred<WH3967> and fifty.<WH2572>
But the Levites<WH3881> were not numbered<WH6485> among<WH8432> the children<WH1121> of Israel;<WH3478> as the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>

And the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> did<WH6213> according to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses:<WH4872> so<WH3651> they pitched<WH2583> by their standards,<WH1714> and so<WH3651> they set<WH5265> forward,<WH5265> every<WH376> one<WH376> after their families,<WH4940> according<WH5921> to the house<WH1004> of their fathers.<WH1>
